name: Ninja Twins
description:
Ninja Twins is an original and unique puzzle game created by Kronbits in which you control two ninjas, moving them at the same time.


The game has a total of 30 levels. Learn what you can do with the blocks in the early stages, before you face the most mind-blowing puzzles you have ever played.

Your objective is simple: touch the chest with one of the characters, avoiding the ninja stars or colliding with your twin, while using the as few movements as possible and keeping both alive

How to play

Move the ninjas with the arrows in 4 directions. If they collide you die! Can you beat the 30 levels?

Available Platforms

Windows, MacOS, Linux, Android(Mobile/Tablets) and OUYA !

To be updated you can follow me at Twitter, Tumblr or support me at Patreon
